Install LPAR2RRD

We use lpar2rrd to monitor the CPU usage of PowerVM shared CPU pools.

Obtain the software

  • Download the software from here http://www.lpar2rrd.com/download.htm

Pre-requisits installation

  • Change the system wide configuration for file descriptors
    sudo vi /etc/sysctl.conf

    Add this 

    fs.file-max = 100000

    Refresh 

    sudo sysctl -p

Installation on RHEL6

  • Create a user
    sudo useradd -m lpar2rrd
  • Configure ulimit for lpar2rrd user
    sudo vi /etc/security/limits.conf
  • Install Apache
    sudo yum -y install httpd
